summary: Mechanical engineer with more than 7 years' experience in construction field of EPC Oil & Gas industries onshore and offshore projects including structural, process piping, underground piping system, flow lines, transmission pipelines, pressure vessels, storage tanks and static/rotating equipment.

experience.title: Senior Construction Piping Engineer
experience.description: Installation of equipment including slug catcher, high-pressure scrubber, knockout drum, 16 inch Metering Gas Skid and oily water treatment unit with tie-in to new piping network. Construction of oil and gas pipelines (16 inch x 30 km oil line; 16 inch x 18 km gas line). Fabrication of oil and firefighting tanks (500 m3). Oil, gas and firefighting piping network around GOSP. Plant commissioning and startup. Offshore activities: platform A/B works with carbon steel transmission lines (24 inch, 8 inch, 4 inch x 17 km), deck extensions (110 ton), well head hookup piping, multiple deck extensions with marine rigs, replacement of pipelines and valves at platform AMAL-A, installation of conductors and piles, and related erection work.

experience.title: Construction Piping Engineer
experience.description: Replacement of old 2 regeneration columns (34 m height, 80 tons). Tie-in piping network for pre-compression plant to support a rectification project replacing over 500 valves and implementing ~50 plant modifications (FCP). Fabrication and installation of new metering. Recycle compressors A&B (FCP-239) â€” changing first and second stages from carbon steel to duplex; hydro test. Construction of several carbon steel transmission pipelines including trenching, stringing, welding, coating, lowering, sand-bedding, back filling; wellhead hookup piping (duplex), hydro test, cable tray and electrical & instrument works for 10 wellheads. Supervisor for grit blasting & painting of OBAIYED south F/L (carbon steel 10650 m/l) with epoxy HR coating. Construction and installation of a new water treatment project.

experience.title: Constructions / Piping Engineer
experience.description: Erection and installation procedure for the ultrasonic flow metering system. Remove/dismantle and install metering skid with valves. Remove/dismantle and install old cable & control house and sampler. Connect all instrument cables to metering house and junction box. Pre-commissioning and commissioning service.
